articles.title: How the likes of Apple and Spotify are changing podcasting - TODAYonline
articles.description: Apple recently announced that it is creating technical infrastructure for paid podcast subscriptions. For Spotify, making exclusive podcast deals with high-profile talent has been a means to draw ears into its ecosystem and keep them there.
